game.title: Quest for the Golden Scepter
game.objective: Find and retrieve the lost Golden Scepter
game.description: The ancient Golden Scepter has been stolen by the infamous dragon Nyx. Your quest is to infiltrate the dragon's lair and return the scepter to the people of our kingdom.
game.reward: The King's Favor and 5000 gold pieces

task.objective: Gather information from the village elder
task.description: The village elder, wise and experienced, knows the way to the dragon's lair. You must persuade him to share this knowledge.

task.objective: Acquire the Dragon Ward amulet at Frosthold City
task.description: The Dragon Ward amulet can protect you from Nyx's fiery breath. You can buy it at the city merchant.

task.objective: Infiltrate Nyx's lair and reclaim the Golden Scepter
task.description: With the Dragon Ward amulet and the information from the elder, reach Purple Ridge Mountains and defeat Nyx to recover the scepter.
